tools.name: create_table
tools.description: Create a new table in the SQLite memory bank.

tools.name: list_tables
tools.description: List all tables in the SQLite memory bank.

tools.name: describe_table
tools.description: Get detailed schema information for a table.

tools.name: drop_table
tools.description: Drop (delete) a table from the SQLite memory bank.

tools.name: rename_table
tools.description: Rename a table in the SQLite memory bank.

tools.name: create_row
tools.description: Insert a new row into any table in the SQLite Memory Bank for Copilot/AI agents.

tools.name: upsert_memory
tools.description: 🔄 **SMART MEMORY UPSERT** - Prevent duplicates and maintain data consistency!

tools.name: read_rows
tools.description: Read rows from any table in the SQLite memory bank, with optional filtering.

tools.name: update_rows
tools.description: Update rows in any table in the SQLite Memory Bank for Copilot/AI agents, matching the WHERE clause.

tools.name: delete_rows
tools.description: Delete rows from any table in the SQLite Memory Bank for Copilot/AI agents, matching the WHERE claus...

tools.name: run_select_query
tools.description: Run a safe SELECT query on a table in the SQLite memory bank.

tools.name: list_all_columns
tools.description: List all columns for all tables in the SQLite memory bank.

tools.name: search_content
tools.description: Perform full-text search across table content using natural language queries.

tools.name: explore_tables
tools.description: Explore and discover table structures and content for better searchability.

tools.name: add_embeddings
tools.description: ⚠️  **ADVANCED TOOL** - Most agents should use auto_smart_search() instead!

tools.name: auto_semantic_search
tools.description: 🚀 **ZERO-SETUP SEMANTIC SEARCH** - Just search, embeddings are handled automatically!

tools.name: auto_smart_search
tools.description: 🚀 **ZERO-SETUP HYBRID SEARCH** - Best of both worlds with automatic embedding!

tools.name: embedding_stats
tools.description: Get statistics about semantic search readiness for a table.

tools.name: semantic_search
tools.description: ⚠️  **ADVANCED TOOL** - Most agents should use auto_smart_search() instead!

tools.name: smart_search
tools.description: ⚠️  **ADVANCED TOOL** - Most agents should use auto_smart_search() instead!

tools.name: find_related
tools.description: Find content related to a specific row by semantic similarity.

tools.name: generate_knowledge_graph
tools.description: 🎯 **KNOWLEDGE GRAPH GENERATOR** - Visualize your memory as an interactive graph!

tools.name: create_interactive_d3_graph
tools.description: 🎨 **PREMIUM D3.JS KNOWLEDGE GRAPH** - Interactive enterprise visualization!

tools.name: create_advanced_d3_dashboard
tools.description: 🚀 **ENTERPRISE D3.JS DASHBOARD** - Premium visualization dashboard!

tools.name: export_graph_data
tools.description: 📊 **GRAPH DATA EXPORT** - Professional data format conversion!

tools.name: intelligent_discovery
tools.description: 🧠 **INTELLIGENT DISCOVERY** - AI-guided exploration of your memory bank!

tools.name: discovery_templates
tools.description: 📋 **DISCOVERY TEMPLATES** - Pre-built exploration workflows for common scenarios!

tools.name: discover_relationships
tools.description: 🔗 **RELATIONSHIP DISCOVERY** - Find hidden connections in your data!

tools.name: batch_create_memories
tools.description: 🚀 **BATCH MEMORY CREATION** - Efficiently add multiple memories at once!

tools.name: batch_delete_memories
tools.description: 🗑️ **BATCH MEMORY DELETION** - Efficiently delete multiple memories at once!

tools.name: find_duplicates
tools.description: 🔍 **DUPLICATE DETECTION** - Find duplicate and near-duplicate content!

tools.name: optimize_memory_bank
tools.description: ⚡ **MEMORY BANK OPTIMIZATION** - Optimize storage and performance!

tools.name: archive_old_memories
tools.description: 📦 **MEMORY ARCHIVING** - Archive old memories to reduce active storage!

tools.description: 🧠 **LLM-ASSISTED DUPLICATE DETECTION** - AI-powered semantic duplicate analysis!
